BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Items.Title: Communication from the Democratic Committee of Richmond County - Submitting for the Advice & Consent of the Council, the name of Michael J. Ryan, for appointment as the Richmond County Democratic Commissioner of Elections, pursuant to Section 3 – 204 (2) of the Election Law.
Items.ActionText: This Communication was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Michael J. Ryan, Richmond County Democratic Commissioner of Elections

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of David Yassky to the Council for its advice and consent regarding his appointment to the New York City Taxi and Limousine Commission, Pursuant to Sections 31 and 2301 of the City Charter.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: David Yassky, New York City Taxi and Limousine Commission

Items.Title: Communication from the Democratic Committee of Richmond County - Submitting for the Advice & Consent of the Council, the name of Michael J. Ryan, for appointment as the Richmond County Democratic Commissioner of Elections, pursuant to Section 3 – 204 (2) of the Election Law.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Communication be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Michael J. Ryan, Richmond County Democratic Commissioner of Elections

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of David Yassky to the Council for its advice and consent regarding his appointment to the New York City Taxi and Limousine Commission, Pursuant to Sections 31 and 2301 of the City Charter.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Mayor's Message be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Rose and Ignizio
